Name: Average time from 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' follows
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time elapsed for all instances of 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time to 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' across all cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Declined and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to 'SW-Reviewer Declined' after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Minimum time between 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and the next 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average time for 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to be followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Average time it takes from 'SW-Reviewer Declined' to 'Assign a Different Editor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Total time for all instances of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
